item.title: Mr. Couey, Welcome to Hell
item.description: If you were with me in the winter of 2005, you may have read these posts about Jessica Lunsford, a beautiful Florida girl was missing for two weeks before investigators found her body. 3.19.05 Grant Her Peace 3.17.05 Person of Interest in Custody 3.5.05 Update on Missing Florida 9-Year-Old 2.28.05 Jessica Lunsford She was sexually assaulted for a week, then buried alive by this evil son of a bitch:
